title: Interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream: Today, the clouds are white and dark in color and are on their way to rain. Clouds are abundant in autumn and also abundant in winter, accompanied by rain that is usually moderate to heavy. In some dreams, rain is interpreted as a narrow relief, but what it means; Clouds in a dream? But there are various rumors about seeing clouds in a dream, and there are those who say that clouds in a dream are a repulsive vision, and there are those who say that seeing clouds in a dream is a praiseworthy vision and there is no fear of it. . This issue is what we will resolve through the interpretations of the great scholar Ibn Sirin and other great interpreters. We advise you to resort to a translator who specializes in interpreting dreams if you want to interpret a dream or vision and do not resort to a researcher seeking translation. Through our article today we will discuss with you the interpretations of the great scholars who specialize in Interpretation of dreams to interpret clouds according to their interpretations in a dream. Interpretation of seeing clouds in a dreamIt is worth noting that dream interpretation is a recognized science and is now taught in major Egyptian universities due to its importance, and dreams are interpreted according to various factors, the most important of which is the social as well as psychological state. The condition of the person and the gender if he is male or female.. Of course, the interpretation of a man’s dream is completely different from the interpretation of a woman, even if they are similar. Clouds are clouds that have formed and it has not rained yet, but it is about to rain, and they are usually gray in color, so if one sees clouds in A dream, so what do these clouds mean in a dream? Follow the interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream. Through the following paragraph, we will present to you the various general interpretations of seeing clouds in a dream from the great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin and others: Scientists specializing in the interpretation of dreams have agreed to interpret the dream of clouds in a manner General, as it was said that it is a mercy from God to people because of the rain that these clouds carry, in addition to being a clear and explicit indication of wisdom, knowledge, and sustenance, as well as the salvation of people from sins. It is also said by some scholars that clouds in a dream indicate Islam and Muslims in general, In addition, the movement of clouds in a dream is a sign and reference to the movement of seas and ships together. Also, the movement of clouds in a dream may indicate the movement of caravans, and clouds in general may indicate a woman’s pregnancy if she is married. There is an interpreter specializing in the science of dream interpretation who says that dreams A clear and explicit reference to guidance and the Islamic religion, as well as the Prophetic Sunnah with which God bestowed upon our Master Muhammad. Clouds in a dream The dream interpreter who specializes in the science of dream interpretation also says that a dream of clouds can refer to the law and the constitution, in addition to science and knowledge. According to the great scholar and dream interpreter Ibn Sirin, he says that the black cloud is evidence of the harm of demons, as well as its harm if the cloud is associated with something harmful, such as electric lightning, in addition to stones. Follow the clouds in the dream. As for the scholar Al-Nabulsi, he had a different opinion, as he said that if the dreamer sees the black cloud in a dream, this means happiness and lust.

title: The 12 most famous interpretations of seeing Satan in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a person in a dream, the devil, and he is happy and pleased? Evidence that the dreamer is far from God and follows the world and does not look beyond it. The meaning of seeing a married woman in a dream, the devil is following her? It indicates the presence of enemies in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing the devil happy and cheerful in a dream? What proves that the dreamer is one of those who left prayer. Interpretation of a dream about killing the devil in a dream? Evidence of the salvation of people from temptation. What is the interpretation of seeing a person in a dream touched by the devil? It is mentioned that he eats usury. Interpretation of the dream of the devil by Ibn Sirin If a person sees the devil in a dream and is a seeker of knowledge, he will fail to gain knowledge. The devil in a person's dream is evidence of being far from God Almighty. If a person sees the devil in a dream and is happy and joyful, this is evidence that the dreamer is far from God and follows this world and does not look at the afterlife. Then seeing the devil in a dream without clothes indicates that the fortune teller will leave his place. Whoever sees the devil in a dream, teaches him speech, this indicates the false words that the dreamer utters. Then seeing a person in a dream touched by the devil, this indicates that he is a person who eats usury. Seeing a dream of the devil for a married woman Seeing Married woman, the devil, taking off her clothes, indicates her separation from her husband. Then seeing the devil in general in a married woman's dream is one of the unpleasant visions. If a married woman sees in a dream that the devil is following her, this indicates the presence of enemies in her life. Interpretation of the dream of the devil by Nabulsi Seeing the devil happy and cheerful in a dream is evidence that the seer has abandoned prayer. Seeing a person in a dream that he is killing the devil, this indicates the salvation of people from temptation. Then seeing a person in a dream touched by the devil, this is a sign of getting rid of enemies, especially if he remembers God. Seeing the devil in a dream means that you have abandoned prayer and worship. After that, seeing the slaughter of the devil in a dream is evidence that the seer is a righteous man. Seeing fear of the devil in a dream is evidence of the believer's dedication to religion and performing all acts of worship. Interpretation of the dream of the devil for a man Seeing a man in a dream is the devil, this indicates his importance in worldly goodness. Then seeing the devil in a dream standing in front of the house, this indicates the bad news that the fortune teller will hear. The devil entering the house in a dream is evidence of the theft of the house by some thieves. Then seeing the devil around the seer in a dream means disobedience and committing Sins. The devil appears in a man’s dream, an unpleasant vision. The devil in a dream is evidence of the viewer’s distance from religion. Seeing a man in a dream, the devil tearing his clothes, indicates unpleasant things happening to the dreamer. Then seeing a man in a dream killing the devil, this is an indication that someone is conspiring against him. Seeing the devil torturing him in a dream, this indicates the release of anxiety. If he sees the devil holding his hand saying: “There is no power or strength except with God,” this is evidence of his being afflicted with a great sin.

Seeing a person in a dream killing Satan indicates that people will be saved from temptation. Then seeing a person in a dream touched by Satan is a sign of getting rid of enemies. Especially if he mentions God. Seeing Satan in a dream means that you have abandoned prayer and worship. After that, seeing Satan slaughtered in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a righteous man. Seeing fear of Satan in a dream is evidence of the believer’s devotion to religion and performing all acts of worship. Interpretation of a dream about Satan for a man: Seeing the man in a dream is the devil, this indicates his importance in worldly good things. Then seeing the devil in a dream standing in front of the house, this indicates the bad news that the fortuneteller will hear. The devil entering the house in a dream is evidence of the theft of the house by some thieves. Then seeing the devil About the dreamer in a dream means disobedience and committing sins. Satan appears in a man’s dream as an unpleasant vision. Satan in a dream is evidence of the viewer’s distance from religion. Seeing a man in a dream, Satan tearing his clothes, indicates unpleasant things happening to the dreamer. Then seeing a man in a dream He kills Satan, this is an indication that there is someone conspiring against him. Seeing Satan tortures him in a dream, this indicates the release of anxiety. If he sees Satan holding his hand, saying: “There is no power nor strength except in God,” this is evidence that he is afflicted with a great sin.

title: I know the interpretation of a burning dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about burning: Burns are among the things that can cause sadness and pain to those who suffer them. As for seeing burning in a dream, will it be good or is there another nutritional element behind this dream that needs attention, and in the following lines we will explain the details so that we do not drift between different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of burning: Seeing the dreamer burning in a dream means finding a solution to the sad news that he knew in the past. The previous period, and a burn on the face in the sleeper’s dream indicates betrayal and deception that he will soon be exposed to because of his trust in people who are not good for him. Seeing a fire on her leg in a girl’s dream leads to her losing her job because she is not worthy of work, and the burnt hand in the dreamer’s sleep symbolizes The worries and sorrow that he goes through in the coming years are because of him. Weak personality and his inability to take responsibility in different situations. Interpretation of a dream about burning by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a complete fire in a dream indicates that the dreamer will fall into the wrong actions that he performs, and if he does not abandon them, he will be exposed to severe torment and the wrath of his Lord upon him. She falls into the abyss, so she must wake up from her neglect and ask for forgiveness. Seeing her hand burned in a dream for a man will bring her a lot of money from an unknown source, which may lead her to a great loss that will turn her from a rich and luxurious life into extreme poverty. Honest, run by those who want to get rid of them. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about burning according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing the dreamer burning in a dream indicates bad The misfortune that he will suffer due to his negligence in his work, which may lead to his dismissal from it, and burning in a dream for the sleeper indicates the health crisis that the person will cause. His face is due to his inability to follow the instructions of a qualified doctor, which may lead to feelings of distress. Seeing burning in a woman’s dream leads to disputes arising between her and her relatives over inheritance and may end in a split, and burning in the dreamer’s sleep symbolizes her superiority in the stage of study to which she belongs. After she was freed from the hatred and envy that she suffered from her friends. Interpretation of a dream about burning for an unmarried woman: Seeing burns in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the imminent conclusion of her marriage contract with the man she wanted to be close to for a long time and with whom she will live with love and affection. Seeing a girl burning in A dream means that she will find a suitable job opportunity that will improve her financial situation in the coming period, and burning in the dreamer’s sleep symbolizes the happiness that she will enjoy in the next life. Interpretation of a dream about burning for a married woman: Seeing complete burning in a married woman’s dream means the marital strife that she is exposed to because the woman A woman with bad morals sneaks up on her husband with the intention of ruining the house, creating a vacuum in the family and breaking it up. He carried her after a long wait. Seeing the burnt hand in the dreamer’s dream leads her to help the poor and needy until it happens

title: Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: A ring in a dream for a married woman. Women often use ornaments and decorations in their real life. By nature, she loves to appear beautiful and elegant, and there is no doubt that wearing these jewelry gives her elegance and beauty. There is a version that women use, which is made of gold and another of silver. Made of silver, it can be worn by both men and women, and this article will highlight the interpretation of a ring in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a ring in a dream for a married woman and this vision carries many different indications and interpretations, some of which indicate goodness and others do not, and this is due to To the context of the vision itself, the interpretation of this dream by a married woman is as follows: A woman who is delaying childbearing sees in her dream a ring made of gold. There is no doubt that this is a sign of pregnancy, God willing, and she will give birth, and God knows best. This dream also appears to a married woman in a dream that she She will gain a great deal of sustenance and a lot of money on her way in the coming period. If a married woman sees that her husband in a dream will give her a new gold ring. Ibn Shaheen sees this as a sign of the approaching pregnancy of this woman. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that a married woman who sees a ring Of gold, it may indicate a feeling of happiness and stability. While if a woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a narrow ring, this is a sign that this woman will be exposed to many difficulties. She will also be exposed to pressure, problems, and crises. As for Imam Nabulsi, he believes that huge gold in a dream could be An indication of a woman’s good conduct and good reputation. If a married woman sees many rings in her dream, this may represent the multiplicity of offspring that the woman will give birth to. See also: Interpretation of seeing a golden ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Losing a ring in a dream for a married woman. As we mentioned previously, the interpretation of dreams varies depending on The context of the dream depends on the circumstances and conditions of the dreamer, but if a married woman sees the loss of her ring in a dream, then this dream has an interpretation, which is as follows: The dream interpreter Al-Osaimi believes that if a married woman’s wedding ring is lost in her dream, this indicates the separation and divorce of the woman from the husband, The reason for this is because he performed some wrong actions and behaviors. This vision may also indicate that this woman will suffer a major financial loss if it is gold. If the woman is going to participate in a new project in her life, and she sees this dream in her dream. It may indicate This vision indicates that he will suffer failure and great financial loss in relation to this project. As for the scholar Ibn Sirin, this dream indicates the woman’s inability to make the right decisions in her life. Among the interpretations that were given regarding this vision is that it indicates the inadequacy of that woman in worship. Therefore, this dream serves as a warning message to return to Almighty God and approach Him in obedience. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a blue ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a gift of a gold ring. This vision has many interpretations that connect

title: Perfume in a dream and the sex of the fetus

preview.html: What we learn together from our website is interpreted, and we also know the interpretation of a dream for a man, a young man, a divorced woman, a pregnant woman, and a single woman. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream for a single girl. Seeing perfume in a dream in all circumstances is good news for everyone, and the interpretation for an unmarried girl is very good except in one case, and we will mention it and give All the details: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream, she is buying a bottle of perfume with a wonderful smell. This shows that the girl will go far in her studies. When the vision is that the girl is shopping, she is looking for a specific bottle of perfume and then finds it after a while. It shows that she got lost in Something in her life. That is, he found a bottle of perfume and saw it, this explains that he will resolve this matter, God willing. In the case of spraying perfume on the body of an unmarried girl in her home. This will be a good omen in the imminent date of the engagement of a young man of good character. It also explains that the matter What makes her very happy is hearing very good news. However, if a girl wears perfume outside the house, whether at work, on the street, or anywhere, it shows that she is doing something wrong and must stop. As for receiving perfume, it is a gift in a dream for a single woman. It means that there is a young man who wants to marry her and will propose to her soon. If a girl dreams that she smells perfume, and it smells good and she loves it. This shows that she will be stable and single and will live a happy life. If the scent of perfume resides in the place where she was unmarried, this means that her wishes will come true. It will come true soon, God willing. If the girl does not like the smell of perfume, this explains that she is going through a period full of problems. If he sees that the dead person has wronged him, and he comes to her in a dream asking for perfume, it means that he is asking for forgiveness for her. See also: Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation Perfume in a married woman’s dream: Perfume in a married woman’s dream is very good and there is no need to see it, as it is considered a good vision in all cases, and we will mention that now: To see perfume in general in a married woman’s dream, explains a happy and professional life with her husband and children. If a married woman sees her husband giving her a bottle Perfume, this means intense love and affection between her and her husband. If a married woman puts perfume on her clothes, this explains that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. But if he puts perfume on one of his relatives, he was also sick. God willing, he will recover completely, so the vision is good news for him. The application of perfume by a married woman on her husband is interpreted by the good deeds and livelihood that she will obtain in the coming period. And if he has one of his children, God willing, he will succeed in his studies with distinction, and will be a good son only to his parents. Applying perfume in a married woman’s dream on her head or somewhere Near her. It explains that she will get rid of a problem between her and her husband and will return to a happy life again. Buying perfume for a married woman is interpreted by the fulfillment of the desire she longs for. If the married woman is working, this means that she will be in a distinguished position in her work. And the smell of perfume in a woman’s dream For a married woman, it indicates goodness and grace that will be showered

title: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with a deceased person for a married woman

preview.html: Such as a dead person driving a car in a dream, this is a good thing in itself and evidence of the great success of the visions, and we will learn about them in this article through our interpretation site, so follow us. Interpretation of the vision of riding a car with a dead person in a dream for a single girl. Seeing dead people in one dream represents What is missing in her life, what she is looking for and what she does not find, and the loss of a large part of her former self. If she sees herself in a car with dead people, this may indicate a journey that is not external but internal, that is, inside herself, where she suffers from tensions and psychological pain. And if I knew this dead person and noticed that he was driving his car with him. This indicates a strong desire for that person and a sense of loss and depression. As well as difficulties in meeting the needs accompanying it. However, if it is unknown, it does not identify the deceased. This vision indicates the presence of a message or symbols. The viewer has not yet realized its meaning. See also: The detailed interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing a dead person in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a car with a dead person in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman who dreams of riding in a car with a dead man, this indicates the long life of that woman, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she was She walks with the deceased in a car, then this is a sign that she is not satisfied with her current situation. If a married woman sees her father dead in a car in a dream, this is an indication that her father bodes well for her. However, if a married woman sees a dream in which she walks with a dead person in a car This is evidence that he will get rid of his problems. In addition, if a married woman sees a dream in which she is driving a car with a dead person. This indicates that her financial situation has improved. However, if she meets a married woman in a dream, then she is driving her car with a dead man. This is a sign that the woman has problems with her husband’s family. Likewise for a married woman dreaming of traveling by car with a deceased person and that deceased person was her husband. This dream indicates that she is working on improving her parenting. In addition, if you see a married woman in a dream, this portends With a person who has been dead for a long time. It indicates the pursuit of sustenance, goodness, and happiness. The interpretation of a dream in which she is riding in a car with a dead woman is an indication that she is entering a new phase of her life. The interpretation of seeing a car riding with a dead woman in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man drives away with the dead, this means That he will give up all his fears and problems. Likewise, if someone sees that the dead person is driving the car and he is sitting next to him. This is a warning message for whoever wants the dead person to tell him, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone you love and crying over him. The meaning of seeing riding in a car with the dead person in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation if the pregnant woman runs away With dead people in the car, it means that she will go through the stages of pregnancy, and give birth safely and smoothly without difficulties. As well as the problems and pain that she had in the past. If a pregnant woman sees that she is driving a car, there are dead people in it as well. Strong evidence of her soon due date and ease That labor will occur and a reminder of the need to prepare

title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing spinach in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing spinach in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about spinach in a dream for a man and a woman. Spinach is a vegetable that contains a percentage of iron, and therefore has many health benefits. Helps control blood sugar levels. As for cancer, it also helps lower blood pressure, and the interpretation of spinach in a dream has many interpretations and connotations that we will learn about in our article, because the interpretation in a man’s dream differs from his vision for a woman. Interpretation of a dream about spinach by Ibn Sirin Spinach in a dream is a sign of an illness from which the dreamer will recover. Seeing unsuitable spinach is a sign of stress and problems that the fortuneteller will fall into. Spinach in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is busy with his career. Yellow spinach is a sign of misery and pessimism. Seeing fresh spinach is a sign of a lot of money. Eating cooked spinach is a sign On vitality and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a single woman: Seeing green spinach is a sign of good and happy news. Spinach in a girl’s dream is evidence that she will get married soon, especially if it is green. Cooking green spinach is evidence of getting rid of worries and problems. If an unmarried girl sees spinach and is sick, This is a sign of a speedy recovery. Seeing fresh spinach is praiseworthy. Eating spinach in a single girl’s dream is evidence of the marriage of a young man of good character. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a married woman: Eating green spinach in a dream is a sign of short labor. If a married woman believes that she is cooking Spinach, this is a sign of comfort. Seeing a married woman preparing spinach is a sign of the marital happiness in which she lives. Yellow spinach is a sign of trouble and tension. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a pregnant woman. Eating green spinach is an indication of an imminent expiration date. Eating spinach in a dream is A sign of a difficult and tiring birth. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a man: If one sees spinach in a dream, this indicates a new baby. Seeing small spinach in a dream is a sign of blessing and sustenance and God will bless him with a good wife. Spinach is evidence of relief from stress and sadness in a man’s dream. To see Cutting yourself spinach means a lot of money and a good life. Interpretation of a dream about eating spinach: Seeing a dreamer eating spinach in a dream means happiness for him. A sick person who sees spinach in a dream indicates that the illness will be cured soon. Seeing anxiety about spinach in a dream indicates the disappearance of one’s fears And his sorrows. Fresh green spinach symbolizes good health. Interpretations of spinach in a dream by Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq and Imam Al-Nabulsi believe that eating spinach in a dream for a man and a woman has many meanings and interpretations, represented by the abundance of money and a blessed life in it. In a dream, eating spinach indicates stability and marriage Close to a high-ranking person. If the dreamer sees a lot of yellow spinach in his dream, this indicates a serious illness and possibly death, and the spinach that is harvested

Seeing collectors in a complete dream is one of the visions that some people are looking for an explanation for. So we've rounded up all our favorite followers for you. The correct interpretations of seeing a sewage explosion in a dream are complete, as we have put together the interpretation of sleep about you falling into sewage water in detail for men and women from the books of great scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Why dream of a sewage system - Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a complete mosque in a dream indicates sins and disobedience. Which the dreamer commits in his life. Seeing sewers screaming in a dream in full and not killing him means that there are unpleasant things in the dreamer’s life and he must be careful about them. Also, killing sewer cockroaches by the dreamer indicates getting rid of enemies and keeping them away from them. Seeing collectors in A complete dream means envy and magic that will harm the dreamer in his life if he sees collectors in the sewer. Why dream of sewer cables in a complete dream is one of the visions that indicate the fulfillment of goals and desires. Also, the interpretation of sleep, an overflow of the sewage system in the house, refers the residents of the house to Problems and sorrows, but God knows best. The interpretation of sleeping in a sewer indicates that you will face a lot of trouble. But seeing running water in Kamel’s dream speaks of the imminent task that the girl will complete. Sewerage far from home in a dream means complete elimination of the worries and problems that lonely people suffer from. See also: Why Dreaming of cleaning the bathroom in a complete dream. Why dream of an overflowing sewage system in the house indicates difficult experiences, sadness, and distressed circumstances. It indicates Connecting a sewer pipe by a woman in a dream indicates the end of quarrels and problems that she faces. Also, the unpleasant smell of sewage from a married woman indicates that she is committing immorality and many mistakes and she must repent before revealing her relationship. Escaping from the sewer in a dream of a married woman testifies To fulfill desires and aspirations for herself, her husband and her children. But a pregnant woman who puts the drain in her complete dream indicates an easy and affordable birth, as well as that she and her fetus will be happy.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eggplant according to Fahd Al-Osaimi, Ibn Sirin, and Ibn Shaheen.

preview.html: Dear reader, we present to you our article from the encyclopedia about the interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream. A place with a different interpretation that you may see yourself buying. Interpretation of eggplant in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi. Seeing it in a dream has many different meanings, depending on the situation in which it came, and depending on the person, whether male or female. And was he single, single, married, married, pregnant or divorced? Many people see eggplant in a dream, and sometimes its color is black and sometimes it can be white. This is when the person wakes up and has a desire to know the meaning of the dream, and does it bring with it good skin or Bad. Therefore, in the following lines, we will present the opinion of the scientist Fahd Al-Osaimi to see eggplant in a dream in different situations. Just follow us. Interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream. According to Imam Ibn Shaheen, eggplant in a dream, especially outside of the time, indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many crises. And serious problems. If a person sees him at the right time when he is ripe, this is evidence that goodness and benefit will reach him. If he collects eggplants at the wrong time, this indicates this person’s hatred and envy towards others around him. But if a person eats them in a dream, this is evidence of achieving goals. Different and achieving those dreams that he tried to achieve.Interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream by Imam NabulsiSeeing regular eggplant in a dreamImam Nabulsi says in his interpretation that seeing eggplant in a dream touches him as one of the good visions, and indicates that this person has a good reputation and good morals, when he sees any type of eggplant Even if it is. Black. If one sees that he is eating eggplant, this means that he used the various licenses that God granted him. If he gives it to another person, this indicates your hatred and envy for that person to whom you gave the eggplant. Interpretation of eating white eggplant. If the dreamer is eating white eggplant, this is a clear indication He has an abundance of goodness, brings a lot of money and is distinguished by his good CV among the people around him. Seeing boiled eggplant in a dream. If the dreamer sees boiled eggplant, this is an undesirable thing and indicates sadness, anxiety, and a lot of sorrow for the person having the vision. It shows that this person will gossip and does not trust others. Seeing fried and baked eggplant in a dream. If you see eggplant fried in oil, this It indicates that the person has a high status and high status among people in society. As for the unmarried woman, this indicates that many positive changes have occurred in her life, and if she sees that she is being questioned, this means that she will get married soon. As for the woman who is already married, if If she saw fried eggplant in her dream, this means bad, because it indicates severe suffering during pregnancy and sometimes it may mean losing the child, but if she sees fried eggplant, this indicates that she will. She will give birth to a male. Seeing stuffed eggplant in a dream. If one sees stuffed eggplant, or buys eggplant, the meaning varies from women to men. See the eggplant
